ing.item: Yellow food coloring; more or less

directions.step:
1. Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add sugar and agar-agar and cook, stirring, until the mixture begins to thicken.
2. Stir in evaporated milk, banana extract and food coloring. Remove pan from heat.
3. Pour mixture into a shallow rectangular pan. Let cool; then refrigerate until set. Cut in 1-inch squares.
4. Serve in individual dessert dishes, either plain or with Chinese preserved fruits in syrup.
From <The Thousand Recipe Chinese Cookbook>, ISBN 0-517-65870-4. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
